data.content:
API

Fixed an issue causing some links to break (thanks @ArkDelta for the heads-up)
Added support for marketplace_negotiations_messages (GET & POST)


Marketplace

Negotiations: Chat now updates automatically.
Listings: Verified users can upvote or downvote listings.
Added support for emoji shortcodes (e.g. :blush:) in listing descriptions and support messages
Minor bug fixes

UEX 2.2 – Org Tools & Marketplace UpgradesWe’re rolling out new features to give organizations more control and improving the marketplace experience across the board.

New Org Trader Role: Organizations can now assign the Trader role to trusted members, allowing them to:

Add and edit org listings
Negotiate on behalf of the org
More flexibility, with basic accountability built in.


Marketplace Improvements

Manage > Audit: New org-level activity log to help managers monitor member actions (basic logging for now, more coming soon)
Manage > Rating: You can now search your own ratings (limited visibility for privacy)
Manage > Deals:

Added "Org" filter (visible if you're linked to an org)
Bug fixes and performance tweaks


Negotiate

Fixed a bug preventing ratings in some cases
Chat button removed from org-linked listings (as multiple members may manage them)
General bug fixes


Reporting

Upgraded reporting system with improved stats
All reports are reviewed — if ToS violations are found, we act quickly




API

Webhooks (Early Support): We’re laying the groundwork for webhook integration. While still early, this opens the door to syncing external tools or automating workflows — more flexibility for power users and orgs.


Stability Note

While tested extensively, some bugs may surface. If you spot anything unusual, let us know.



Thanks for helping us build a fairer, safer marketplace for everyone.

Marketplace

Manage → Settings: Added a Trading Hours input, allowing advertisers to more clearly indicate their in-game availability.


Account

Orgs: Fixed an issue that prevented the verification tool from reading the confirmation code on the RSI website (thanks to @PLAYDAGAMES for the heads-up!).


Users

Fixed an issue where the wrong user profiles were being displayed.

We're rolling out an optimization update that, while tested internally, may introduce some unexpected bugs across the site. We're actively monitoring for issues.If you notice something broken, please let us know via our Bug Report page.We can't respond to everyone or fix every issue immediately, but we always read and appreciate your feedback.

Signup: Fixed an issue that prevented new users from completing the signup process, which was showing an unintended 'Bla bla bla' (yeah, I know...) placeholder message. Apologies for the oversight.
API →  data_submit: PTU reports should now be correctly classified as submissions. Thanks to @PLAYDAGAMES for the heads-up.

Account → Verification: Optimized the verification process to improve accuracy and reduce false negatives.
User Profiles: Fixed an issue that prevented certain profiles from loading correctly.

Account Settings: Resolved an issue where certain website preferences were not saving as intended.
Trade Center: Introduced "Incidents" in the trade log, marking locations where you encountered issues such as pirate attacks or collisions with space debris.

Items

Fixed a critical bug that caused the Items page to remain non-functional. Unfortunately, this issue occurred during our break time, so we apologize for the oversight.


Trade → Routes

Added 'No Questions Asked' filter and fixed an issue that prevented routes to or from these terminals from appearing in the routes list.

Marketplace → Negotiations → Deals Tab

Fixed an issue where messages and notifications from blocked users still appeared in the Deals list.


Fleet → My Orgs

Fixed an issue where vehicles from users removed from organizations continued to appear on the list.


Trade → Routes

Added an 'Averages' filter that allows toggling between routes based on the latest reported values and the new 15-day averages.

Trade

Routes: Fixed an issue that caused incorrect profit calculations for subroutes.

Marketplace

New listing images now automatically include a watermark with the advertiser's username. This helps reduce the risk of image theft. Advertisers can also upload a custom watermark via the Marketplace > Manage > Settings page.
Advertisers can now specify the source of an item, allowing clients to know whether it originates from a pledge, loot, piracy, or duplication.
Fixed an issue affecting the 'Newest' sort filter.


API

/marketplace_listings

Fixed an issue that omitted several keys from the results under certain conditions.
Added the source key to the results.

API

/marketplace_negotiations

You can now list all advertisement deals associated with a user. 


/user_notifications

Users can now retrieve account notifications via the API. Requires the user's secret_key.


/user

Added new columns: is_datarunner, is_datarunner_banned and is_staff.

API > data_submit

Added optional date_added parameter to allow setting a custom report creation date.

Account / Organizations

Fixed an issue that prevented some users from leaving an organization on their own
Fixed a permission issue that prevented org owners from deleting their organizations (Thanks @Lucky_MuadDib!)


Marketplace / Negotiations

Fixed an issue where expired listings under negotiation were not properly labeled, causing users to believe the negotiation was still active

Account Settings & Organizations > Manage:

Fixed an issue where form data was unintentionally displayed after submission. (Thanks @TheKronny!)

Items

Fixed an issue where items with an asterisk in their names were not searchable. (Thanks @Hurricane!)


Marketplace > Manage > Negotiations

Negotiations: Fixed an issue where negotiations for hidden listings were not displayed. (Thanks @FatalMerlin!)


API > terminals

The name parameter now searches both the name and nickname fields.

API

data_submit

Resolved an issue that triggered a 500 error during screenshot uploads.

Marketplace

Negotiations

A 5-star rating is now selected by default to prevent accidental negative reviews when users forget to set a rating.




Trade

Routes

Added Average values for reference




Users

Reviews

Added a "My Reviews" section where users can view the reviews they've written.

Trade

Trade Center

Fixed a major issue that caused unknown wallet registries to appear randomly, resulting in invalid wallet values. Thanks to @kay_j for the heads up.


Price Finder

(Datarunners Only) Fixed a link formatting issue that caused the History query to return incorrect results, including wrong average values.

Commodities

Info

Fixed an issue where clicking on charts (datarunners only) opened the History tool with the wrong period selected.




Mining

Pricing / Mining Center

Fixed an issue preventing Stileron and Silicon from appearing in the list.
Fixed an issue causing some links to throw a 404 error page.

Items

Due to an internal process issue, several item attributes were updated with incorrect data. Since our backups are from a previous version, and the last patch brought many changes, we’re asking datarunners to help us correct them. You can submit updates via Data > Request or directly on an item’s page under Specifications > Update (Datarunners only). We appreciate your support and apologize for the inaccurate info.
Outdated attribute values are now visually marked.
Info Page: Fixed an issue that was preventing the search bar from functioning properly.


Datacenter

Fixed an issue where attributes with a value of "0" were not saved to the database after processing reports. (Thanks @Xerwon!)

Trade

Trade Center

Added a Transaction input to log total transaction values.

Entering the Transaction amount and SCU will auto-calculate the Price.
Entering the Price and Transaction will auto-fill the SCU.


Fixed an issue that could prevent users from editing certain trade trips.
Your feedback is important — let us know what you think about these changes!

Mining

Components

Added visual highlights to indicate when a mining item was updated in a different game version than the one currently supported by the site.
Enabled horizontal scrolling via click-and-drag with the mouse.




Datacenter

Requests

Edit Report

Fixed an issue where editing a request could cause the loss of report attribute data, reverting to default values instead.
Additional bug fixes.

Marketplace

Negotiations Page

Fixed an issue that prevented some users from sending messages during negotiations.




Mining

Added a new Components tab featuring simple tables for quick attribute comparisons.

Accounts

Introduced a new Notifications tab, allowing users to manage how they receive updates across the site. For now, only Marketplace notifications are available.To help keep costs under control, email notification frequency will be limited. If you'd like to support the site and help expand notifications to other tools, consider becoming a donor.


 Marketplace

Home

Added a Sort by filter


Item Info

The label 'Online {x} days ago' now displays an approximate time based on the trader's last activity.


Manage

You can now hide negotiations you no longer want to follow


Negotiations

Fixed an issue where webhooks were not triggered when a deal was closed.
Sending a message or closing a deal will now trigger transactional emails — for users who have email notifications enabled.

Account

Added 'Friend Requests' tool

Marketplace

Lists

Fixed a rounding issue that caused price anomalies.


Negotiations

Fixed an issue where seller/buyer ratings (stars) were displaying incorrect values.
Added In-game Location to the negotiation header.


Advertise & Edit

Added new In-game Location input (thanks @Immandil!).




User Profiles

Marketplace Tab: Fixed a counting issue that caused price anomalies.


API

marketplace_listings & marketplace_advertise

Added column 'location'
Updated documentation

API

commodities: Adding 'is_refinable' column. 


Users

User Profile Page

Reworked for improved readability.
Marketplace Tab

Added transaction labels (WTS, WTB, WTT, WTF, etc.).
Added "Sold Out" and "New" item labels.
Added a quick search feature.
Pagination is planned for a future release.


Reviews Tab

Now displays both positive and negative reviews.
Note: Not all reviews may be shown due to internal filtering criteria.
Pagination is planned for a future release.


Fleet Tab

Added a quick search feature.
Datarunner Tab (Visible only to Datarunners)
Moved the home chart to this tab.
Added new statistics section.






Marketplace

Added a new "Harvestables" category under Commodities (thanks to @Ronillon for the suggestion).
Advertise: Fixed an issue preventing some users from progressing to the next step due to a "missing language" error. (thanks @CitizenJaxSnow)
Home: Fixed a display issue with favorite labels.
Manage > Listings

Fixed a database performance issue that caused long load times.
The "Deals" column now displays deals in a n/n format (successful deals / total negotiations). Hovering shows the success percentage.

Marketplace > Negotiations page: Fixed a layout issue that was hiding part of the page. Thanks @SouthernNord for the heads up. Apologies for the disruption.
Other fixes and improvements. Thanks to @Lulu, @agathorn, @Testiculitis, and others for your bug reports.

Marketplace

Negotiations

Negotiations can no longer be ended by either party within the first 24 hours. This change helps prevent clients or suppliers from ending negotiations prematurely due to delayed responses. Since users are in different time zones, this aims to reduce misunderstandings. Rolled back temporarily.
Timezone information (if selected by the user) is now displayed on the negotiations screen.


Info Page

Added "More From Seller" suggestions to display other relevant items listed by the same trader.
Increased the number of "You May Also Like" listings from 8 to 16.




Datacenter

Submit

Request: Fixed an issue where items with double quotes in their names weren’t fully populating in the input field. (thanks @Hurric4ne!)




Mining

Mining Center

Fixed an issue where only the first refinery job row was exported when clicking "Download as CSV". (Thanks @Hokman!)




Commodities

Averages Index tab

Fixed an issue that prevented certain commodities from appearing in the list.




API

The commodities_ranking resource is now deprecated. We recommend using the cax_score column from the commodities_averages endpoint as a replacement.
Migrated raw-form commodities from 'commodities_averages' to the new 'commodities_raw_averages' table.
Added 'buy prices' for resources commodities_raw_prices and commodities_raw_prices_history.
